item.title: Importing Data into R - Part 1
item.description: Introduction This is the first post in the series Importing Data into R. Before we get started, let me talk a bit about what we will learn in this series. I am planning to write 3 posts in which we will explore how to read data from: flat/delimited files (.csv, .txt, .tsv) excel spreadsheets (.xls, .xlsx) statistical softwares JSON/XML There are other ways to get data into R such as databases, APIs etc.
